lead_paragraph: BITENSKY--Halina Zobler, our beautiful, elegant and much-loved mother and grandmother, passed away on Tuesday. As a young girl, she exhibited unimaginable bravery and determination to survive the Holocaust, but rarely spoke of it, instead forging a new life in New York, earning her BA and MA in history, raising a family, and being an invaluable partner to Samson. She touched so many with her innumerable acts of kindness and generosity. She was selfless, funny, and sweet, but with a core of steel. We are profoundly saddened by our loss. Susan, Peter and Benjamin Lerner Beth, Steven and Allison Myers Jessica, Brad, Sammy and Sloane Spiegel 1/3
